altername_name: Warui Osama to Rippa na Yusha
name: The Cruel King and the Great Hero
overview: Join an intrepid girl on her many adventures as she strives to become a hero with the help of her mighty dragon protector. Along the way, meet new friends, collect items, and help folks from all walks of life! Discover a heartwarming tale of kindness, companionship, and family in a gorgeous hand-drawn world.
